description:
Speaker: Andrea Spichtinger

Track:PyData
This talk discusses time series anomaly detection methods for predictive maintenance of machines in bottling plants and their implemention on AWS edge devices.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/7XCL3Z
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Time Series Anomaly Detection for Bottling Machine
